name: Flexion Free Pilates
description: This class is designed for individuals who have been advised to exercise with little spinal motion, and is appropriate for all fitness levels. Pilates exercises help to strengthen muscles and increase range of motion, balance and stability.
fullDescription: This class is designed for individuals who have been advised to exercise with little spinal motion, and is appropriate for all fitness levels. Pilates exercises help to strengthen muscles and increase range of motion, balance and stability.
whatTheyOffer: This class is designed for individuals who have been advised to exercise with little spinal motion, and is appropriate for all fitness levels. Pilates exercises help to strengthen muscles and increase range of motion, balance and stability.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
